name.ja: <ruby>光<rt>こう</rt></ruby><ruby>征<rt>せい</rt></ruby><ruby>竜<rt>りゅう</rt></ruby>－スペクトル

text.en: You can discard this card and 1 LIGHT or Dragon monster; add 2 "Dragon Ruler" monsters from your Deck to your hand, except "Spector, Dragon Ruler of Auroras". You can banish this card and 1 LIGHT or Dragon monster from your GY, then target 1 "Chasmatis, Dragon Ruler of Poles" in your GY; Special Summon it. You can only use 1 "Spector, Dragon Ruler of Auroras" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
